alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 12:42AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact parts of northeast Iowa through 215 AM CDT... At 1238 AM CDT, doppler radar was showing strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Nashua to near Shellsburg. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in the 30 to 45 mph range and pea size hail. SOURCE...Weather observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oelwein, West Union, Guttenberg, Elkader, Postville, Monona, Fayette, Strawberry Point, Fredericksburg, McGregor, Garnavillo, Elgin, Clermont, Maynard, Hawkeye, Arlington, Marquette, Farmersburg, Waucoma and Volga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa.
